QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_LaborResourceBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of labour resources.

QtoDef.Name: StandardWork
QtoDef.Definition: Work that is performed at regular times, up to a particular limit after which overtime rates may apply.

QtoDef.Name: OvertimeWork
QtoDef.Definition: Work that is performed after exceeding a particular limit such as hours per day and/or hours per week, after which company or municipal policy requires a different rate to apply. Note: Policies for when overtime takes effect are the responsibility of the user or application; they are not modelled in IFC.
